targets.query: agent.labels.group:$Grupo AND agent.name:$Servidor AND data.vulnerability.severity:Low AND location:vulnerability-detector

agent.labels.group:$Grupo AND agent.name:$Servidor AND data.vulnerability.severity:Critical  AND location:vulnerability-detector
agent.labels.group:$Grupo AND agent.name:$Servidor AND data.vulnerability.severity:Low AND data.vulnerability.status:Solved
agent.labels.group:$Grupo AND agent.name:$Servidor AND data.vulnerability.severity:Medium AND data.vulnerability.status:Solved
agent.labels.group:$Grupo AND agent.name:$Servidor AND data.vulnerability.severity:High AND data.vulnerability.status:Solved
agent.labels.group:$Grupo AND agent.name:$Servidor AND data.vulnerability.severity:Critical AND data.vulnerability.status:Solved
agent.labels.group:$Grupo AND agent.name:$Servidor AND data.vulnerability.severity:*  AND location:vulnerability-detector
agent.labels.group:$Grupo AND agent.name:$Servidor AND data.vulnerability.severity:* AND data.vulnerability.status:Solved NOT data.vulnerability.severity: Untriaged
